https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/jf3MWdCo8eM5AJeyy21xISRSyfe.jpg Before horror enthusiast Max can break things off with his girlfriend Evelyn she dies in a bus accident. In time, Max meets another woman only to have Evelyn resurface as a zombie ready to resume their relationship. Burying the Ex
